description: Palindromes which are the product of two consecutive primes.
comments: No further terms < 2*10^17.Next term > 36*10^18. - _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 11 2010
links: P. De Geest, More palindromic products of integer sequences
mathematica: palQ[n_] := n == FromDigits@ Reverse@ IntegerDigits@n; p = 2; q = 3; lst = {}; While[p < 6 10^9, If[ palQ[p*q], AppendTo[lst, p*q]; Print[p*q]]; p = q; q = NextPrime@q]; lst (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 11 2010 *)
author: _Patrick De Geest_
